articles.description: A new study has shown Apple Airpods work just as well as hearing aids at a fraction of the cost. Here is a setting rundown to turn your earbuds into hearing ...
articles.content:
For older Americans, a hearing aid can be super expensive. The average cost of a doctor-prescribed pair can range from a whopping $2,000 to $7,000.
